name: create-precast-app
description: CLI tool to scaffold modern web applications with your chosen stack

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --format esm --clean && tsup test-runner.ts --format esm --clean --out-dir dist-test
scripts.test:core: bun run build && node dist-test/test-runner.js --suites core
scripts.test:generation: bun run build && node dist-test/test-runner.js --suites generation
scripts.test:report: bun run build && node dist-test/test-runner.js --report-path ./reports/test-report.html --report-format html
